vote.title: Authorize payments to Dallas County for processing and maintaining City prisoners at the Lew Sterrett Criminal Justice Center, pursuant to Amendment No. 5 to the Criminal Justice Center Memorandum of Agreement with Dallas County previously approved on April 27, 2022, by Resolution No. 22-0662, for the period October 1, 2022 through September 30, 2023 - Not to exceed $8,344,443.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
